rightValue.stringValue: Value of jobs on PO & Number Items
Value of jobs on PO & Number Items

Flow.description: 06/10/2025 - changed from address for the customer request 14-01-2025 - Added function to bypass specific site in CX ref ion Collection_Details 14-06-2024 : added If Account_Require_Customer_Reference__c = TRUE, Customer_Reference__c a required 29-09-2024: replace redirect to record Id 17-04-2024: added do not redirect 05-04-2024: added Incurs rental charges functionality 07-03-2024: added new email templates 06-12-2023: added Active - Rebate Only Screen 29-09-2023: Collection Date Holiday Validation Added -hide previous and pause button -By pass Site Phone REquired for Domestic Job -Site Phone Required on Exchange Job. curr: delivery date shouldn't be null for custom exchange prev: update job error path added.

formulas.name: templateName
formulas.expression:
IF(TEXT({!jobObj.Order_Product__r.Pricing_method__c}) == "Fixed",
CASE({!jobType}, "Exchange", "X2_0_Fixed_Job_Template_Exchange", "Wait & Load", "X2_0_Fixed_Job_Template_Wait_Load", "X2_0_Fixed_Job_Template_Delivery") , IF(TEXT({!jobObj.Order_Product__r.Pricing_method__c}) =="Variable",
CASE({!jobType}, "Exchange", "X2_0_Variable_Job_Template_Exchange", "Wait & Load", "X2_0_Variable_Job_Template_Wait_Load", "X2_0_Variable_Job_Template_Delivery")
, IF(TEXT({!jobObj.Order_Product__r.Pricing_method__c}) == "Rebate",
CASE({!jobType}, "Exchange", "X2_0_Rebate_Job_Template_Exchange", "Wait & Load", "X2_0_Rebate_Job_Template_Wait_Load", "X2_0_Rebate_Job_Template_Delivery")
, "No Template Found")))
